name: Break the Blocks!
description:
Simple breakout-style game. This is the project I started for the Unity2D learning purposes.

There are 15 levels to beat, 3 of them contain 'bosses'. You have 4 lives per each level (they do not cumulate). You can reload a current level by pressing 'R', however it will cost you some points. For more detailed information check out the 'How to play' section of the game.

Have fun!
